---
title: M A Independent Building Services
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: m_a_independent_building_services
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $809.1K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with M A Independent Building Services. The average
  contract duration was 2.4 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.6M. The longest
  contract was 6 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.9M.
lookup_name: 'M A INDEPENDENT BUILDING SERVICES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '809.1K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '33%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '337%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '7'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '3.7M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.4'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.6M'
s425_max_duration: '6'
s422_max_contract_value: '4.9M'
---
